welcome_message_body: Welcome to Babylon, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Alitalia Pizzeria & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Alitalia Pizzeria & Restaurant is a pizzeria located in West Babylon.
restaurants.address: 999 W Montauk Hwy, West Babylon, NY 11704

restaurants.name: Bagel Factory
restaurants.description: Bagel Factory is a bagel shop located in West Babylon.
restaurants.address: 615 W Montauk Hwy, West Babylon, NY 11704

restaurants.name: Restoration Kitchen & Cocktails
restaurants.description: Restoration Kitchen & Cocktails is a restaurant located in Lindenhurst.

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in West Babylon.
restaurants.address: 1025 W Montauk Hwy, West Babylon, NY 11704

restaurants.name: Blaze Pizza
restaurants.description: Blaze Pizza is a pizzeria located in West Babylon.
restaurants.address: 1047 W Montauk Hwy, West Babylon, NY 11704

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at JFK, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at JFK, serving a majority of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A modern terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A terminal primarily used by international airlines, with some domestic flights as well.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: The newest terminal at JFK, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to Air Canada, JetBlue, Southwest, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines and WestJet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
